thread.title: Data hack at 7 Trump hotels confirmed
thread.title_full: Data hack at 7 Trump hotels confirmed

title: Data hack at 7 Trump hotels confirmed
text: Data hack at 7 Trump hotels confirmed Monday, 5 October 2015 (2 minutes ago) Customer credit and debit card numbers may have been stolen at seven Trump hotels after its payment systems were hacked for over a year. Donald Trump's Hotel Chain Reveals Hack 'May Have Stolen Credit Card Data' 00:37 Malware that was active for over a year could have ‘accessed payment card information as it was being inputted,’ Trump Hotel Collection executives say Presidential candidate and real-estate baron Donald Trump’s chain of high-end hotels “may have been the victim of a data security incident”,... Recent related news Hackers may have stolen data from 7 Trump hotels the company has confirmed, after an extended breach. News24 3 hours ago - World Also reported by • SeattlePI.com • MyNorthwest.com • Finextra Malware that was active for over a year could have ‘accessed payment card information as it was being inputted,’ Trump Hotel Collection executives... guardian.co.uk 4 hours ago - US Also reported by • The Consumerist You Might Like
